messages.subject: movie about unschooling maybe?
messages.msgSnippet: All our lives we ve been told what to learn, at south harmon, the students are the teachers....whatever the students say they want to learn We went to the
messages.messageBody:
"All our lives we've been told what to learn, at south harmon, the
students are the teachers....whatever the students say they want to
learn"

We went to the movies Sunday, and saw a trailer for a new movie
'Accepted'. Josh looked at me and said "Momma! It's a movie about
unschooling!" If you go to www.acceptedmovie.com you can watch the
trailer. It's by the same guy who does American Pie, same feel kind
of....
Just thought we'd share...we're looking forward to watching it.
Melissa
Mom to Josh (11), Breanna (9), Emily (7), Rachel (6), Sam (5), Dan
(3), and Avari Rose

share our lives at
http://360.yahoo.com/multimomma





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
